item.title: How Two Ride-Share Guys And An ER Doc Are Building An Air Traffic Control System For Healthcare
item.description: Startup Sage Care is coming out of stealth with $20 million in funding and customers that include Bronson Healthcare and White Plains Hospital.

item.title: Game Director And Producer Tomonobu Itagaki Dies At 58
item.description: Renowned game director and producer Tomonobu Itagaki has sadly passed away at the age of 58.

item.title: This Ukrainian Entrepreneur Built His EdTech App Into A Global Phenomenon—In The Middle Of A War
item.description: Anton Pavlovsky founded Headway Inc to help busy people improve their lives by reading more books—and avoiding doomscrolling. Air raids be damned.

item.title: Kelly Wearstler’s Side Hustle? Creating An AI-Enabled Art Platform
item.description: Kelly Wearstler’s Side Hustle retools galleries with editioned works, scent, sound, and a living archive—collaboration as both business and culture.

item.title: Why Wildfires And Super Pollutants Have Become A ‘Vicious Circle’
item.description: Clean Air Fund chief executive Jane Burston said climate change creates an increased risk of wildfires, which then increases the impact of climate cha...
